analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 7.16. Maggārammaṇattika🔽Namaggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… namaggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… namaggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: magga ārammaṇa ttika  na magga ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe na magga hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe na magga adhipatim dhammam paṭicca
translated: The Triad on the Path as Object🔽With the exception of the two sets of three beginning with “not a path” and “not a path as object,” the method of explanation is the same as in the Dyads on the Path.
In the section on the root cause there are forty-nine triplets. … In the section on the unrelated there are forty-nine triplets.
